FusionEngine::FusionShipDrawable

FusionEngine::FusionShipDrawable Class Reference

Represents a ship visually. More...

FusionShip Ship
 The state container for the ship that this draws.

Detailed Description

Represents a ship visually.

Remarks:
An instance of this object looks after each ship in the scene.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void FusionEngine::FusionShipDrawable::Draw (  )  [virtual]

Draws the drawable.

The implementation of this function should draw something at the given position and rotation. It is the implementors responsibility to decide what is done with the parameters.

Parameters:
position The absolute position of the attached node.
facing The absolute rotation of the attached node.

Reimplemented from FusionEngine::FusionDrawable.

void FusionEngine::FusionShipDrawable::UpdateNode (  ) 

Moves the ship and all its attached accessories.

This function is only used on client-side, as it is used to ensure weapons / engines update their absolute positions for drawing. The server doesn't care about drawing weapons / engines - only their relative positions for fireing, and whether they are still attached, which are stored in ShipResource and ShipState respectively.

See also:
FusionScene | FusionNode | FusionShip | ShipState | ShipResource
